      Subinterfaces of PermutationIndexIF in importance.external.permutation.indices 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  PermutationIndexWithDimIF<I>
      General definition of an importance index that permutes variables in the OOB.
      Classes in importance.external.permutation.indices that implement PermutationIndexIF 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AccAndPermAcc
      For a variable in a tree : computes the accuracy on the OBB and permuted OOB
      class  AccuracyDrop
      For a variable in a tree : computes the decrease in classification accuracy between the OBB and permuted OOB
      class  BcrAndPermBcr
      For a variable in a tree : computes the balanced classification rate on the OBB and permuted OOB
      class  DifferenceInPrediction
      For a variable in a tree : computes the percentage of different predictions between the OBB and permuted OOB
      class  TwoConfusionMatrices
      For a variable in a tree : Computes a contingency table with two vectorized confusion matrices: one for the original OOB and the other for a permuted OOB.
